author: Chris Tomlinson, Chris Tomlinson
title: Salvini: Expect Revolt in Italy Without 100 Billion Euro Bailout
description: Populist Italian senator Matteo Salvini has warned that without a substantial economic aid package of at least 100 billion euros to counter the economic effects of coronavirus, Italians could revolt.
content:
Populist Italian senator Matteo Salvini has warned that without a substantial economic aid package of at least 100 billion euros to counter the economic effects of coronavirus, Italians could revolt.
